Name: Cajun Martini
Instructions: STIR vermouth with ice. Strain, discarding vermouth to leave only a coating on the ice. Pour pepper vodka into mixing glass, stir with coated ice and strain into chilled glass.
Review: A Vodka Martini made with jalapeño-infused vodka.
History: Adapted from a recipe created during the 1980s at Paul and Kay Prudhomme's K-Paul's Louisiana Kitchen in New Orleans, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Cajun Martini contains 71 calories
